eng: While reading the heart-warming message, the boy suddenly smiled.

dun: lalābat śuthart ba ñeɂāhai bhityai cami ledhisat layūvāhai.
mor: lalāba=t śuth0r=t ba ñeɂ-∅-∅-āhai bhity-ai cami ledhis-at le-∅-ū-āhai
eng: Between husband and wife, little attentions beget much love.
Keep your children's feet dry and warm.

dun: viṣmaih remyūvevu saṃlulyoṭu se dā pañjallevu.
mor: viṣ0m-aih remy-∅-ū-evu saṃluly-oṭu se dā pañjall-∅-∅-evu
eng: Help others and you're a hero too.
The eyes are blind. One must look with the heart.
I know who I want to take me home.

dun: nayiḫe sebāre yäyīsūva, līdade ālīce tabheltā yajajak nīyūnī.
mor: nayiḫ-e sebāre yäyīsū-∅-∅-a līdad-e ālīce tabhelt-ā yajaj-ak nī-∅-ū-(n)ī
gloss: sentence-<small>DIR.SG</small>. once_more. read.<small>NECESS-EXP-PAT-PRES.3SG.IND</small>. teacher-<small>DIR.SG</small>. thus.<small>DIST</small>. concern-<small>LOC.SG</small>. student-<small>DAT.SG</small>. say-<small>EXP-AG-PAST.3SG.IND</small>.
eng: The teacher, caringly, told the student to read the sentence once again.

dun: nayiḫat sebāre yēyū tati līdade tabheltā yajajak nīyūnī.
mor: nayiḫ-at sebāre yēy-∅-ū-∅ tati līdad-e tabhelt-ā yajaj-ak nī-∅-ū-(n)ī

eng: «Read the sentence once again» told the teacher caringly to the student.
